statements: SELECT * FROM security_audit;
SELECT audit_id, database_name FROM security_audit WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT auditor_name, vulnerabilities_found FROM security_audit WHERE database_name = 'ProductionDB';
SELECT * FROM security_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, database_name, auditor_name FROM security_audit WHERE vulnerabilities_found IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_audit WHERE database_name='Finance' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM security_audit WHERE vulnerabilities_found LIKE '%SQL Injection%';
SELECT database_name, COUNT(*) AS audit_count FROM security_audit GROUP BY database_name HAVING audit_count > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT database_name FROM security_audit WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_audit WHERE vulnerabilities_found IS NOT NULL AND vulnerabilities_found <> '';
SELECT * FROM Audits;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM Audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_description, vulnerability_severity FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_severity ASC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_status FROM Audits WHERE auditor_name='John Doe';
SELECT vulnerability_type, COUNT(*) FROM Vulnerabilities GROUP BY vulnerability_type;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT audit_id, audit_status FROM Audits WHERE audit_status = 'completed';
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM Audits WHERE audit_status = 'pending' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High' ORDER BY vulnerability_id ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_description, vulnerability_type FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_type = 'SQL Injection'
SELECT * FROM security_audit_reports;
SELECT report_id, audit_date FROM security_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM security_audit_users;
SELECT username, email FROM security_audit_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT audit_date, action_taken FROM security_audit_logs ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_audit_logs WHERE user_id = '9baa7a22-3fdd-4bf1-8684-7d0ae7b02169';
SELECT log_id, audit_date FROM security_audit_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Review';
SELECT report_id, audit_date FROM security_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT findings, remediation_plan FROM security_audit_reports WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT username, role, email FROM security_audit_users WHERE role LIKE '%Admin%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, event_description, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vulnerability_id, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'HIGH';
SELECT * FROM security_checks ORDER BY date_checked DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT id, timestamp, event_description FROM audit_logs;
SELECT vulnerability_id, severity, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='HIGH';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT check_id, check_type, result FROM security_checks WHERE date_checked >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_checked DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityAudits ORDER BY audit_date DESC, id ASC
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM SecurityAudits WHERE audit_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT findings FROM SecurityAudits WHERE id = 1
SELECT description, severity FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE status = 'open'
SELECT action_performed FROM AuditLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SecurityAudits WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT audit_date, findings FROM SecurityAudits WHERE id = 100 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT description, severity, status FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High' AND status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM AuditLogs WHERE action_performed LIKE '%login%';
SELECT username, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
